content: Adjusted EBITDA of $98 million, increased 8% from the fourth quarter of 2021 and adjusted EBITDA margin decreased 70 basis points to 8.9%.The adjusted EBITDA increase was driven primarily by Xator and the ramp-up of new contract awards. Federal Solutions adjusted EBITDA for the full year increased $36 million or 22% from 2021, and adjusted EBITDA margin increased 40 basis points from 8.6% to 9%. Critical Infrastructure adjusted EBITDA increased by $12 million or 30% from the fourth quarter of 2021, and adjusted EBITDA margin increased 80 basis points to 9.4%. Critical Infrastructure's adjusted EBITDA for the full year increased by $7 million or 5% from 2021, and adjusted EBITDA margin decreased 60 basis points to 7.7%.
